comments.content:
That's lovely!

Italian Nannini makes bit more affordable typographical bags like this

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021215222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nannini_4203.jpg)

[http://www.nannini.it/collections/ai\_08\_09/11\_e.html#](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021215222/http:/www.nannini.it/collections/ai_08_09/11_e.html# "http://www.nannini.it/collections/ai\_08\_09/11\_e.html#")

I bought one (a different model) with that pattern a couple of years a go, when they also had rain capes, wellies etc with the pattern.
